articles.author: Mike Coppinger
articles.title: NYSAC cites 'technical issue for Davis knee no-call - ESPN
articles.description: The New York State Athletic Commision, in a statement to ESPN, said it is "reviewing the matter" involving Saturday's Gervonta Davis-Lamont Roach WBA lightweight title fight in Brooklyn.
articles.content:
The New York State Athletic Commission, in a statement to ESPN, said it is "reviewing the matter" involving Saturday's Gervonta Davis-Lamont Roach WBA lightweight title fight in Brooklyn.
